did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Text of a lecture delivered in New York, Chicago, Los Angeles, and San Francisco in October and November 1967 at W. Dorr Legg's invitation.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: English gay activist. Secretary of the Albany Trust and the Homosexual Law Reform Society.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Text of a lecture delivered in New York, Chicago, Los Angeles, and San Francisco in October and November 1967 at W. Dorr Legg's invitation.
